attributes.action: Re-Instate the Winter Fuel Allowance for the most vulnerable in our Society.
attributes.additional_details: The Government has a duty of care to these vulnerable individuals.
attributes.background: I would like for the Government to seriously consider the impact of withdrawing the Winter Fuel Allowance, for the most vulnerable in our society.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Reverse changes to Winter Fuel Payment
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700074
